name: web-streams-polyfill
description: Web Streams, based on the WHATWG spec reference implementation

scripts.test: (cd spec/reference-implementation ; npm install && npm run test)
scripts.bundle:min: browserify -g uglifyify index.es6.js -d -i ./spec/reference-implementation/lib/utils.js -s default -t [ babelify --plugins babel-plugin-unassert uglifyify ] | exorcist ./dist/polyfill.min.js.map > ./dist/polyfill.min.js
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run bundle
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf spec && git clone https://github.com/whatwg/streams.git && mv ./streams ./spec && cd spec && git checkout ba5cc069302db2e325815af7d2cd1e743e12773f && cd ..

author: Diwank Singh <diwank.singh@gmail.com>
